</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	39.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-LEFT: 0.125IN">
<B>
	Financial instruments and risk management
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The financial instruments registered
	by the Company and its subsidiaries include derivatives, which are financial liabilities measured at fair value through
	profit or loss.
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLUE">
</FONT>
	At each balance sheet date they are measured
	at their fair value.
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLUE">
</FONT>
	Interest, monetary adjustment, exchange
	variation and variations arising from measurement at fair value, where applicable,
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	are recognized
	in the result when incurred, under finance income or costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	Derivatives
	are initially recognized at fair value as of the date of the derivative agreement, being subsequently adjusted to fair value.
	The method used for recognizing any gain or loss depends on whether the derivative is assigned or not as a hedge instrument in
	cases where hedge accounting is adopted.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	Through
	its subsidiaries, the Company performs non-speculative derivative transactions, to (i) reduce the exchange variation risks and
	(ii) manage exposure to the interest risks involved. The Company&rsquo;s derivative financial transactions consist basically of
	swap contracts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	The
	Company&rsquo;s financial instruments are presented, through its subsidiaries, in compliance with IAS 32.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 216; VALUE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	F-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	64
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage217"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: BOLD 8PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<A HREF="#DP64339_20F_HTM_TOC" STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Table of Contents
</A>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	TIM PARTICIPA&Ccedil;&Otilde;ES S.A. AND
	SUBSIDIARIES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	At December 31, 2015 and 2014
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(In thousands of
<I>
	Reais,
</I>
	unless
	otherwise indicated)
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	Accordingly,
	the major risk factors to which the Company and its subsidiaries are exposed as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Exchange variation
	risks
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Exchange variation risks refer to the possibility
	of subsidiaries incurring i) losses on unfavorable exchange rate fluctuation, which would increase the outstanding balances of
	borrowings taken in the market along with the related financial expenses; or ii) increase in the cost of commercial agreements
	affected by exchange variation. In order to reduce this kind of risk, the subsidiaries i) enter into swap contracts with financial
	institutions with the purpose of avoiding the impact of exchange rate variations on borrowings and financing; and ii) invest in
	foreign exchange funds with the purpose of reducing the impacts on commercial agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At December 31, 2015, the borrowings and
	financing of the subsidiaries indexed to foreign currency were fully hedged by swap contracts in terms of time and amount. Any
	gains or losses arising from these swap contracts are charged to earnings of the subsidiaries.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The amount invested in the foreign exchange
	funds is intended to hedge foreign exchange exposure linked to US dollar-denominated trade agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Besides the risks mentioned above, no other
	significant financial assets and liabilities are indexed to foreign currencies.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Interest rate risks
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Interest rate risks relate to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The possibility of variations in the fair
	value of TJLP-indexed financing taken by the subsidiary TIM Celular, when these rates are not proportional to that of the Interbank
	Deposit Certificates (CDI). As at December 31, 2015, the subsidiary TIM Celular has no swap transactions linked to the TJLP.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The possibility of unfavorable changes
	in interest rates would result in higher finance costs for the subsidiaries due to the indebtedness and the obligations assumed
	by the subsidiaries under the swap contracts indexed to floating interest rates (CDI percentage). However, at December 31, 2015,
	the subsidiaries&rsquo; financial funds were invested in Interbank Deposit Certificates (CDI) and this considerably reduces such
	risk.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; COLOR: BLUE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	Credit
	risk inherent to the provision of services
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	This
	risk involves the possibility of the subsidiaries incurring losses arising from the inability of subscribers to pay the amounts
	billed to them. To minimize this risk the subsidiaries engage in preventive credit analysis of all requests submitted by the sales
	area and monitor the accounts receivable from subscribers, freezing the ability to use the services, among other actions, in case
	customers do not pay their debts. No customers contributed with more than 10% of the net account receivables or revenues from
	services rendered at December 31, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; COLOR: BLUE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	Credit
	risk inherent to the sale of handsets and prepaid telephone cards
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	policy of the subsidiaries in selling handsets and distributing prepaid telephone cards is directly related to the credit risk
	levels acceptable during the normal course of business. The choice of partners, the diversification of the portfolio of accounts
	receivables, monitoring borrowing conditions, positions and order limits established for traders and the constitution of real
	guarantees are the procedures adopted by the subsidiaries to contain possible problems in collecting from their business
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 217; VALUE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	F-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	65
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage218"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: BOLD 8PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	TIM PARTICIPA&Ccedil;&Otilde;ES S.A. AND
	SUBSIDIARIES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	At December 31, 2015
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(In thousands of
<I>
	Reais,
</I>
	unless
	otherwise indicated)
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	partners.
	There are no customers that contributed with more than 10% of the net accounts receivable of, or 10% of sales revenues at December
	31, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	(v)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Financial credit risk
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This risk relates to the possibility of
	the subsidiaries incurring losses from difficulty in realizing their short-term investments and swap contracts due to bankruptcy
	of the counterparties. The subsidiaries minimize the risk associated with these financial instruments by operating only with sound
	financial institutions, and adopting policies that establish maximum risk concentration levels by institution.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<U>
	Fair value of derivative financial instruments
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	The
	consolidated derivative financial instruments are s
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	hown as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	-
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	67,044
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	67,044
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Total liabilities
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	-
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	67,044
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	67,044
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The fair value of financial instruments
	traded on active markets is based on quoted market prices at the balance sheet date. A market is regarded as active if quoted prices
	are readily and regularly available from an exchange, dealer, broker, industry group, pricing service or regulatory agency, and
	those prices represent actual and regularly occurring market transactions on an arm&rsquo;s length basis. These instruments are
	included in Level 1. The instruments included in Level 1 comprise, mainly, investments of Bank Deposit Certificates (CDBs) and
	Repurchases (Repos) classified as trading securities.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The fair value of financial instruments
	that are not traded on an active market (for example, over-the-counter derivatives) is determined by using valuation techniques.
	These valuation techniques maximize the use of observable market data where it is available and rely as little as possible on entity
	specific estimates. If all significant inputs required to fair value an instrument are observable, the instrument is included in
	Level 2. If one or more of the significant inputs is not based on observable market data, the instrument is included in Level 3.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Specific valuation techniques used to value
	financial instruments include:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Quoted market prices or financial institutions
	quotes or dealer quotes for similar instruments.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	The fair value of interest rate swaps is
	calculated as the present value of the estimated future cash flows based on observable yield curves.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	Other techniques, such as discounted cash
	flow analysis, are used to determine fair value for the remaining financial instruments.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The fair values of derivative financial
	instruments of the subsidiaries were determined based on future cash flows (asset and liability position), taking into account
	the contracted conditions and bringing those flows to present value by means of the discounted future interest rates disclosed
	in the market. The fair values were estimated at a specific time, based on information available and on Company&rsquo;s own valuation
	methodologies.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 219; VALUE: 3 -->

	F-

</P>

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	TIM PARTICIPA&Ccedil;&Otilde;ES S.A. AND
	SUBSIDIARIES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	At December 31, 2015 and 2014
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(In thousands of
<I>
	Reais,
</I>
	unless
	otherwise indicated)
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	regular purchases and sales of financial assets are recognized on the trade date - the date on which the Company undertakes to
	buy or sell the asset. Investments are initially recognized at fair value. After initial recognition, changes in the fair value
	are booked in income for the year as finance income and costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
<U>
	Financial
	risk hedge policy adopted by the Company &ndash; Synthesis
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: ITALIC 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Company&rsquo;s policy states that mechanisms must be adopted to hedge against financial risks arising from borrowings taken out
	in foreign currency, so as to manage the exposure to the risks associated with exchange variations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	Derivative
	financial instruments against exchange variations must be acquired simultaneously with the closing of the debt that gave rise
	to that exposure. The coverage level to be taken out for this exchange exposure is 100% of the risk, both in terms of maturity
	date and amount.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	At
	December 31, 2015 no types of margins or collateral apply to the Company&rsquo;s or the subsidiaries&rsquo; transactions involving
	derivative financial instruments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	criteria for choosing the financial institutions abide by parameters that take into account the rating provided by reliable risk
	analysis agencies, shareholders&rsquo; equity and concentration levels of transactions and funding.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	transactions involving derivative financial instruments entered into by the subsidiaries and outstanding at December 31, 2015
	and 2014 are shown in the table below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
<U>
	December
	31, 2015
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In addition to the swap transactions mentioned
	in the tables above, the Company took advantage of a favorable moment to close a forward swap transaction in advance in order to
	ensure an attractive cost of 79.0% of CDI for a financing agreement in foreign currency that will be disbursed in the future to
	Finnvera/KfW. Swap was closed based on the same payment flow as the debt to be disbursed in the future to ensure full hedging.
	This transaction does not hold foreign exchange risk, since the initial dollar rate for this transaction (Debt and Swap) will be
	simultaneously based on pre-established date in the future. On December 31, 2015 the MTM of the transaction registered in the books
	was R$702 - Asset.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; COLOR: BLACK; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	Given the characteristics of the
	derivative financial instruments of the subsidiaries, our assumptions basically took into account the effect i) of the variation
	in the CDI and; ii) of the variations in the US dollar used in the transactions, achieving, respectively, the percentages and
	quotations indicated below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(213,234,234)">
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: BOTTOM; WIDTH: 28%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	Risk
	variable
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 24%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	Probable
	scenario
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 24%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	Possible
	scenario
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 24%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
<B>
	Remote
	scenario
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	CDI
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	14.14%
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	17.68%
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	21.21%
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(213,234,234)">
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	USD
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	3.9048
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	4.8810
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: BLACK">
	5.8572
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	As
	the subsidiaries hold derivative financial instruments to hedge their respective financial debt, the variations in the scenarios
	are monitored from the respective subject of the hedge, thereby showing that the counterpart of the effects involving the exposure
	created by the swaps will be reflected in the debt. In the case of these transactions the subsidiaries disclosed the fair value
	of the subject matter (debt) and the derivative financial instrument of the hedge on separate lines, as shown in the sensitivity
	analysis position above, so as to reveal the net exposure of its subsidiaries in each of the three scenarios mentioned.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	We
	wish to draw attention to the fact that the sole purpose of the transactions closed by the subsidiaries involving derivative financial
	transactions is to protect their balance sheet position. Therefore, any improvement or deterioration in their respective market
	values will represent an inverse movement in the corresponding installments of the financial debt contracted, which is the subject
	matter of the subsidiaries&rsquo; derivative financial instruments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	Our
	sensitivity analyses referring to the derivative financial instruments outstanding at December 31, 2015 were conducted taking
	into account basically the assumptions surrounding the variations in market interest rates and the variation of the US dollar
	used in the swap agreements. The use of those assumptions in our analyses was exclusively due to the characteristics of our derivative
	financial instruments, which represent exposure to interest rate and exchange variations only.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
<U>
	Position
	showing gains and losses with derivatives in the period
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: BLUE">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In March/15 the Company reversed two swap
	transactions and simultaneously entered into two new ones, with Bank of America and Santander, thus netting R$334 million in revenues.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	At December 31, 2015
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
<U>
	Capital
	management
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	Group&rsquo;s objectives when managing capital is to safeguard the Group&rsquo;s ability to continue as a going concern in order to provide
	returns to shareholders and benefits to other stakeholders, in addition to maintaining an optimal capital structure to reduce
	the cost of capital.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	In
	order to maintain or adjust its capital structure the Company can review its policy on paying dividends, returning capital to
	the shareholders or also issuing new stock or selling assets to reduce its level of indebtedness, for example.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	In
	line with other companies in the sector, the Group monitors among others indexes its financial leverage based on the Net Debt-to-EBITDA
	ratio.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-UNDERLINE-STYLE: DOUBLE; COLOR: BLACK">
	The
	financial leverage indices at December 31, 2015 and 2014 can be summarized as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: BLUE">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78%; COLOR: BLACK; TEXT-DECORATION: NONE; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Total borrowings and derivatives (Notes 18 and 39)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1%; COLOR: BLACK">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1%; COLOR: BLACK; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

	The Company and its subsidiaries maintain
	a policy for monitoring the risks inherent to their operations. Accordingly, at December 31, 2015, the Company and its subsidiaries
	had insurance coverage against operating risks, third party liability, and health, among others. The Management of the Company
	and of its subsidiaries consider that insurance coverage is sufficient to cover eventual losses. The table below shows the main

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	TIM PARTICIPA&Ccedil;&Otilde;ES S.A. AND
	SUBSIDIARIES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	At December 31, 2015 and 2014
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(In thousands of
<I>
	Reais,
</I>
	unless
	otherwise indicated)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	IT IS AGREED
</B>
	as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.1&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions.
</I>
	Subject to any
	express provision to the contrary in this Agreement or in its Schedules or unless the context otherwise requires, in this Agreement
	and its Schedules the following terms have the following meaning:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Advance:
</B>
	Each amount which
	&ndash; as the context requires &ndash; is to be made available out of the Facility or has been made available out of the Facility
	and remains outstanding (irrespective of whether this amount constitutes the whole or only part of the Facility).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Affiliate
</B>
	: In relation
	to a company, partnership or legal entity, a Subsidiary of that company, partnership or legal entity or a Holding Company of that
	company, partnership or legal entity or any other Subsidiary of that Holding Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Authorised Signatory:
</B>
	In
	relation to the Borrower and the Contractor, any person duly appointed by the Borrower or the Contractor to sign any document required
	under this Agreement to be signed or countersigned by the Borrower or the Contractor as the case may be, whose name and a specimen
	of whose signature have been supplied to the Facility Agent, provided that no written notice of the revocation of such appointment
	has been received by the Facility Agent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Authorisation:
</B>
	Any approval,
	authorisation, franchise, permit, consent, exemption, certificate, ruling, order, registration or enrolment which is required by
	law or which should be obtained in accordance with Good Industry Practice in connection with the Project.
<BR CLEAR="ALL">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage229"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	BNDES:
</B>
	Banco Nacional de
	Desenvolvimento Econ&ocirc;mico e Social.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Break Costs:
</B>
	The amount
	(if any) by which:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the interest which the Lender should have received for the period from the date of receipt of all
	or any part of the Loan or an overdue amount to the last day of the current Interest Period in respect of the Loan amount or the
	overdue amount in question, had such amount been paid on the last day of that Interest Period; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	where the Lender or any Participant funds, or makes arrangements to fund, an Advance requested
	in a Notice of Drawdown and such Advance is not made by reason of the operation of any one or more of the provisions of this Agreement
	(other than by reason of default or negligence by the Lender alone), the interest &ndash; calculated to the last day of the Interest
	Period that would have been applicable to such Advance (the
<B>
	Notional Interest Period
</B>
	) &ndash; which the Lender should have
	received if the Advance had been made;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	exceeds:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the amount of interest which, in the Facility Agent&rsquo;s opinion, the Facility Agent would have
	been able to obtain by placing an amount equal to the amount received by the Lender or the amount of funding arranged by the Lender
	(as the case may be) on deposit with a leading bank in the London interbank market for a period starting on the Business Day following
	the receipt or the funding and ending on the last day of the current Interest Period or of the Notional Interest Period (as the
	case may be).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Business Day
</B>
	: A day (other
	than a Saturday or Sunday) on which commercial banks are open for general business (including dealings in foreign exchange and
	foreign currency deposits) in New York.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Central Bank:
</B>
	Banco Central
	do Brasil or any successor to such bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Commitment:
</B>
	For the Lender,
	its Tranche A Commitment, Tranche B Commitment and Tranche C Commitment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Commitment Period:
</B>
	Each
	of the Tranche A Commitment Period, the Tranche B Commitment Period and the Tranche C Commitment Period.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Confidential Information:
</B>
	All
	information relating to a Security Provider, the Group or the Finance Documents of which the Lender or the Facility Agent becomes
	aware in its capacity as, or for the purpose of becoming or being included within the definition of,
<BR CLEAR="ALL">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Lender or the Facility Agent
	or which is received by the Lender or the Facility Agent in relation to, or for the purpose of becoming or being included within
	the definition of the Lender or the Facility Agent under, the Finance Documents from either:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	a Security Provider, the Group or any of their advisers; or

	&nbsp;

	another Party included within the definition of Lender or the Facility Agent, if the information
	was obtained by that Party directly or indirectly from a Security Provider, the Group or any of their advisers,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in whatever form, and includes
	information given orally and any document, electronic file or any other way of representing or recording information which contains
	or is derived or copied from such information, but excludes information that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	is or becomes public information other than as a direct or indirect result of any breach by that
	Lender or the Facility Agent of clause 20 (
<B>
	Confidentiality
</B>
	);
</TD>

	&nbsp;

</TD>

	is identified in writing at the time of delivery as non-confidential by a Security Provider, the
	Group or any of their advisers; or
</TD>

	&nbsp;

	is known by that Lender or the Facility Agent before the date the information is disclosed to it
	in accordance with paragraphs (a) or (b) above or is lawfully obtained by that Lender or the Facility Agent after that date, from
	a source which is, as far as that Lender or the Facility Agent is aware, unconnected with a Security Provider or the Group and
	which, in either case, as far as that Lender or the Facility Agent is aware, has not been obtained in breach of, and is not otherwise
	subject to, any obligation of confidentiality.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This expression includes each
	of such documents severally, and
<B>
	Finance Document
</B>
	means any of them.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Finance Parties:
</B>
	The Facility
	Agent, the Lender and the Participants, which expression includes each of such persons severally and
<B>
	Finance Party
</B>
	means
	any of them.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Frankfurt/London Banking Day:
</B>
	A day, other than a Saturday or Sunday, on which commercial banks are open for general business (including dealings in foreign
	exchange and foreign currency deposits) in Frankfurt am Main and London.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Funding Agreement:
</B>
	Any
	arrangement or agreement entered into for the purpose of enabling the Lender to obtain funding from a Participant in connection
	with the transactions contemplated in this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Good Industry Practice:
</B>
	Standards,
	practices, methods and procedures complying with applicable law, with all Authorisations required to have been obtained pursuant
	to clause 12.2(c) (
<I>
	Obtain authorisations
</I>
	) and with that degree of skill, diligence, judgment, prudence and foresight which
	would ordinarily be expected from a skilled and experienced owner and, as the case may be, operator engaged in the Project.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</P>
</DIV>

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Group:
</B>
	The Borrower and
	its Subsidiaries for the time being, which expression includes each of such companies severally.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Guarantee:
</B>
	An unconditional
	and irrevocable guarantee from the Parent in the form agreed between the Facility Agent and the Parent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Holding Company:
</B>
	In relation
	to a company, partnership or legal entity, any other company, partnership or legal entity in respect of which the first mentioned
	company, partnership or legal entity is a Subsidiary.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Import Goods:
</B>
	Goods manufactured
	or produced in Finland together with such other goods (excluding those the costs of which are Local Costs) as may, in accordance
	with the provisions of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents, be financed under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Import Services:
</B>
	Services
	rendered by persons ordinarily resident or ordinarily carrying on business in Finland together with such other services (excluding
	those the costs of which are Local Costs) as may, in accordance with the provisions of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents, be financed
	under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Indebtedness:
</B>
	Any obligation
	(whether incurred as principal or surety) for the payment or repayment of money, whether present or future, actual or contingent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Indirect Tax:
</B>
	Any goods
	and services tax, consumption tax, value added tax or any tax of a similar nature.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Interest Payment Date:
</B>
	The last day of each Interest Period, provided that if such day is not a Business Day, that Interest Period will instead end on
	the next Business Day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Interest Period:
</B>
	In relation
	to a Loan constituted by an Advance, each period determined in accordance with clause 6.1 (
<I>
	Interest periods
</I>
	) and, in relation
	to an overdue amount under the Finance Documents, each period determined in accordance with clause 6.4 (
<I>
	Default interest
</I>
	)
	or clause 6.5 (
<I>
	Overdue principal during interest period
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	LIBOR:
</B>
	For any Interest
	Period the percentage rate per annum equal to the London interbank offered rate administered by the ICE Benchmark Administration
	Limited (or any other person which takes over the administration of that rate) for deposits in US dollars with a term equivalent
	to such Interest Period displayed on page &ldquo;BBAM @294890&lt;GO&gt;&rdquo; of the Bloomberg Screen ICE Benchmark Administration
	Limited, Official ICE Libor Fixings Page (or any replacement Bloomberg page which displays
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 8; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage234"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	7
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	that rate) or on the appropriate
	page of such other information service which publishes that rate from time to time at approximately 11:00 a.m. (London time) on
	the Rate Fixing Day for that Interest Period as the London interbank offered rate for US dollars for a period equal in length to
	that Interest Period or, if none of the periods quoted by Reuters or Bloomberg are equal in length to that Interest Period, the
	applicable LIBOR will be determined by linear interpolation using the next shorter and next longer periods quoted by Bloomberg.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	LIBOR Reference Rate:
</B>
	LIBOR
	or, if the Bloomberg page referred to in the definition of LIBOR does not have the required details or these pages are not accessible,
	the Substitute LIBOR Quotation but, if any such rate is below zero, the LIBOR Reference Rate will be deemed to be zero.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Loan:
</B>
	At any time the aggregate
	of all Tranche A Advances, Tranche B Advances and Tranche C Advances then outstanding.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Local Costs:
</B>
	The costs
	of goods manufactured or produced or of services supplied under the Export Contracts within the Relative Country, as are, in accordance
	with the provisions of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents, eligible to be financed under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Margin:
</B>
	0.70% (zero point
	seven zero per cent.) per annum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Material Adverse Change:
</B>
	Any
	event or change of condition which has a material adverse effect on any of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The ability of the Borrower or the Parent to perform its payment obligations under the Transaction
	Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The business or the financial condition of the Borrower, the Parent or the Group as a whole.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The validity or enforceability of a Finance Document.

	A notice
	substantially in the form set out in Schedule 2.

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Participant:
</B>
	A person from
	whom the Lender receives a formal commitment to provide funding through the execution of, or the accession to, a Funding Agreement
	with the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Parties:
</B>
	The parties to
	this Agreement, and
<B>
	Party
</B>
	means any of them.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Potential Event of Default:
</B>
	An event or circumstance referred to in clause 13.1, which would (with the giving of notice, the lapse of time, the making
	of any determination or the satisfaction of any condition as provided in that clause) be an Event of Default.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Project:
</B>
	The Borrower&rsquo;s
	capital expenditure programme, including the on-going and future roll-out of equipment and services to be supplied by the Contractors.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Protected Party:
</B>
	Any Finance
	Party which is or will be subject to any liability, or required to make any payment for or on account of tax in relation to a sum
	received or receivable (or any sum deemed for the purposes of tax to be received or receivable) under this Agreement or any Funding
	Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Rate Fixing Day:
</B>
	The second
	banking day in Frankfurt am Main and London (being a day, other than a Saturday or Sunday, on which commercial banks are open for
	general business (including dealings in foreign exchange and foreign currency deposits) in Frankfurt am Main and London) before
	the beginning of the relative Interest Period.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Reais
</B>
	or
<B>
	R$:
</B>
	The
	lawful currency of the Relative Country.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>
	The Federal
	Republic of Brazil.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Repayment Date:
</B>
	The Tranche
	A Repayment Date, the Tranche B Repayment Date or the Tranche C Repayment Date, as the context may admit or require.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</B>
	means
	the repayment schedule set out in Schedule 6 to this Agreement.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	ROF:
</B>
	Registro de Opera&ccedil;&atilde;o
	Financeira, the registration required by the Central Bank for cross-border credit transactions such as the transaction contemplated
	by this Agreement, evidencing the registration of the financial terms and conditions of this Agreement in the Central Bank&rsquo;s
	electronic system SISBACEN.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Security:
</B>
	A mortgage, charge,
	pledge, lien or other security interest securing any obligation of any person or any other agreement or arrangement having a similar
	effect.
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Security Documents:
</B>
	Each
	of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any document evidencing or creating Security over any asset of a Security Provider to secure any
	obligation of the Borrower to the Facility Agent under the Finance Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This expression includes each
	of such documents severally, and
<B>
	Security Document
</B>
	means any of them.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Security Providers:
</B>
	Each
	of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parent.
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Each other person that grants a Security in favour of the Facility Agent pursuant to the Security
	Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This expression includes each
	of such persons severally, and
<B>
	Security Provider
</B>
	means any of them.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Subsidiary:
</B>
	A company,
	partnership or legal entity of which a person either:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	owns directly or indirectly more than 50% of its voting capital or similar right of ownership and,
	for the purposes of this Agreement, a company, partnership or legal entity is still to be treated as a subsidiary of a person even
	if the relevant shares are registered in the name of (i) a nominee for that person, (ii) a party holding security over such shares
	granted by that person, or (iii) that secured party&rsquo;s nominee; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	has direct or indirect control and
<B>
	control
</B>
	means the power (whether by contract or otherwise)
	to direct its affairs or to direct the composition of its board of directors or equivalent body.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Substitute LIBOR Quotation:
</B>
	For any Interest Period the percentage rate per annum determined by the Lender to be the arithmetic mean (rounded up, if necessary,
	to the next 1/16th of one per cent.) of the yearly rates of interest at which loans in US dollars, in an amount comparable to the
	Advance in question and for a period nearest to that Interest Period are offered on the Rate Fixing Day for that Interest Period
	by three leading banks in the London interbank market selected by the Facility Agent in consultation with the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
