<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Total Commitments:
</B>
	The
	aggregate of the Tranche A Commitments, the Tranche B Commitments and the Tranche C Commitments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche:
</B>
	Any of Tranche
	A, Tranche B and Tranche C.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A:
</B>
	The tranche
	of the Facility referred to in clause 2.1(a).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Advance:
</B>
	Each
	amount which &ndash; as the context requires &ndash; is to be made available out of Tranche A or has been made available out of
	Tranche A and remains outstanding (irrespective of whether this amount constitutes the whole or only part of Tranche A).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Available Commitment:
</B>
	The Tranche A Commitment less the Tranche A Loan but, in determining the amount of the Tranche A Available Commitment at the
	date a Notice of Drawdown for Tranche A is delivered, there will be deducted (without any double counting) from such amount each
	of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any Tranche A Commitment that is to be reduced or cancelled on or before the drawdown date referred
	to in such Notice of Drawdown.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The aggregate principal amount of any other Tranche A Advances to be made on or before the drawdown
	date referred to in such Notice of Drawdown.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Commitment:
</B>
	For
	the Lender, the amount set opposite its name under the heading
<B>
	Tranche A Commitment
</B>
	in Schedule 1 to the extent not cancelled,
	transferred or reduced under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Commitment Period:
</B>
	The period from the date of this Agreement until (and including) 29 June 2016 or such other dates as the Borrower and the Facility
	Agent (with the consent of the ECA Insurer) may agree.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A ECA Insurer Premium:
</B>
	The premium payable to the ECA Insurer pursuant to the ECA Insurer Cover Documents relating to Tranche A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A ECA Sub-Tranche:
</B>
	Has the meaning given to that term in clause 2.1(a)(ii).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Import Costs:
</B>
	Up
	to USD 53,775,000.00 being the amount of the Contract Price for Import Goods and Import Services allocated to Tranche A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche A Import Sub-Tranche:
</B>
	Has the meaning given to that term in clause 2.1(a)(i).
<BR CLEAR="ALL">
</P>

	At any
	time the aggregate of all Tranche A Advances then outstanding.

	Repayment Schedule
</I>
	).

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	Tranche A Starting Point of
	Credit Date:
</B>
	30 June 2015, being the mean delivery date of the delivery period (January 2015 to December 2015) under Tranche
	A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</B>
	The tranche
	of the Facility referred to in clause 2.1(b).

	Tranche B and remains outstanding (irrespective of whether this amount constitutes the whole or only part of Tranche B).

	The amount of the Tranche B Total Commitments less the Tranche B Loan but, in determining the amount of the Tranche B Available
	Commitment at the date a Notice of Drawdown for Tranche B is delivered, there will be deducted (without any double counting) from
	such amount each of the following:
</P>

	&nbsp;

	(with the consent of the ECA Insurer) may agree.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche B Import Costs:
</B>
	Up to USD 57,465,441.18, being the amount of the Contract Price for Import Goods and Import Services allocated to Tranche B.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche B Import Sub-Tranche:
</B>
	Has the meaning given to that term in clause 2.1(b)(i).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche B Loan:
</B>
	At any
	time the aggregate of all Tranche B Advances then outstanding.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

</B>
	Each date specified as such in Schedule 6 (
<I>
	Repayment Schedule
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	Credit Date:
</B>
	30 June 2016, being the mean delivery date of the delivery period (January 2016 to December 2016) under Tranche
	B.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	Tranche C:
</B>
	The tranche
	of the Facility referred to in clause 2.1(c).

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche C Advance:
</B>
	Each
	amount which &ndash; as the context requires &ndash; is to be made available out of Tranche C or has been made available out of
	Tranche C and remains outstanding (irrespective of whether this amount constitutes the whole or only part of Tranche C).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Tranche C Available Commitment:
</B>
	The amount of the Tranche C Total Commitments less the Tranche C Loan but, in determining the amount of the Tranche C Available
	Commitment at the date a Notice of Drawdown for Tranche C is delivered, there will be deducted (without any double counting) from
	such amount each of the following:
</P>

	&nbsp;

	to in such Notice of Drawdown.

	the Lender, the amount set opposite its name under the heading

	in Schedule 1 to the extent not cancelled.
	transferred or reduced under this Agreement.

	Agent (with the consent of the ECA Insurer) may agree.

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Successors
</I>
	. Natural persons, legal entities, partnerships or unincorporated associations
	includes any natural persons who, or legal entities, partnerships or unincorporated associations which, succeed in whole or in
	part to their rights or obligations under the Finance Documents by assignment, by assumption of obligations, by operation of law
	or otherwise.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Amended versions.
</I>
	The Finance Documents or other document or security is a reference to
	the Finance Documents or other document or security as amended, supplemented, novated or replaced from time to time.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Continuing event.
</I>
	An Event of Default, Potential Event of Default or Event of Mandatory
	Prepayment is
<B>
	continuing
</B>
	when it has not been remedied or waived.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	Regulation.
</I>
	A regulation includes any regulation, rule, official directive, request or guideline
	(whether or not having the force of law but, if not having the force of
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	law, being of a type with which
	any person to which it applies is accustomed to comply) of any governmental, intergovernmental or supranational body, agency, department
	or of any regulatory, self-regulatory or other authority or organisation.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.3 &#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A period equal in length
</I>
	.
	The determination of the extent to which a rate is
<B>
	for a period equal in length
</B>
	to an Interest Period will disregard any
	inconsistency arising from the last day of that Interest Period being determined pursuant to this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	and
<B>
	dollars

	denote the lawful currency of the United States of America.

	Third party rights
</I>
	. The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Rights under the Rights of Third Parties Act
</I>
	. Unless expressly provided to the contrary
	in a Finance Document, a person who is not a party to a Finance Document has no right to enforce or enjoy the benefit of any of
	its terms under the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999 (the
<B>
	Third Parties Act
</B>
	), provided that the ECA Insurer
	and a Participant may enforce its rights under, and enjoy the benefit of the terms of, the Finance Documents subject to the provisions
	of the Third Parties Act.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Consent of third parties not required
</I>
	. Notwithstanding any provision of the Finance Documents,
	no consent of any third party is required for any amendment (including any release or compromise of any liability) or termination
	of a Finance Document.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.7&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	ECA Insurer override.
</I>
	Notwithstanding
	anything to the contrary in this Agreement, nothing in this Agreement will oblige a Finance Party to act (or omit to act) in a
	manner that is inconsistent with any requirement of the ECA Insurer under or in connection with the terms of the ECA Insurer Cover
	Documents and, in particular:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	each Finance Party is authorised to take all such actions as it may deem necessary to ensure that
	all requirements of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents are complied with; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a Finance Party will not be obliged to do anything if, in its opinion, to do so could result in
	a breach of any requirements of the ECA Insurer under or in connection with, or affect the validity, of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	provided always that nothing in
	clause 1.7 will affect the Borrower&rsquo;s obligations.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.1 &#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Amount and purpose
</I>
	. Subject
	to the terms of this Agreement, the Lender makes available to the Borrower each of the following facilities to be used as set out
	below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

	the
<B>

	; and

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.2&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Calculation of the USD equivalent
	amount.
</I>
	The US dollar equivalent amount of an Advance to reimburse amounts paid in Brazilian Reais will be determined as follows:
	where a Notice of Drawdown relates to the Reais part of a Contract Price, the Reais amount in question will be converted into US
	dollars. Such conversion will be calculated on the basis of the monthly average USD/BRL exchange rate by reference to the month
	in which the relevant invoice was paid and adhering to the exchange rates published by Brazil&rsquo;s Central Bank under the transaction
	PTAX800, in the SISBACEN (Central Bank System), ask rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.3&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Reduction in Commitment &ndash;
	No drawdown or reduced drawdown by first repayment date.
</I>
	If no drawdown under a Tranche has taken place by the first Repayment
	Date applicable to that Tranche, the Commitment for that Tranche will be reduced by 1/17
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	of the principal of such
	Tranche. If on the first Repayment Date applicable to a Tranche the amount outstanding under the relevant Tranche is less than
	1/17 of the principal amount of that Tranche, an amount equal to the difference between such outstanding amount and 1/17
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	of the principal amount of the relevant Tranche will be deemed to be repaid and an equal amount of Commitment under such Tranche
	will be cancelled.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.4&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower liable for any shortfall.
</I>
	Any amount payable under any Export Contract or of an ECA Insurer Premium and any other amount that is not eligible for financing
	under this Agreement must be paid by the Borrower as and when due.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.5&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No verification.
</I>
	Neither the
	Facility Agent nor the Lender will be obliged to monitor or verify the application of an amount borrowed under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>

</P>

	2.6
</TD>
<TD>
	Subject to Clause 4.2, the Borrower is not obliged to
	drawdown part or all the amount of any tranche under the Facility.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	3.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Availability
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Conditions precedent.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Schedule 3 documents.
</I>
	A Notice of Drawdown (for the relevant Tranche &ndash; to the extent
	appearing in Schedule 3) may not be given until the Facility Agent has notified the Lender and the Borrower that it has received
	the documents and evidence set out in Schedule 3 in form and substance satisfactory to it or the Facility Agent has waived the
	requirement of receipt of such documents or evidence that have not been received. The documents and evidence that are to be received
	must be received at least 10 Business Days before receipt of the first Notice of Drawdown.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notice from the Facility Agent.
</I>
	The Facility Agent will give the notification referred to
	in clause 3.1(a) promptly upon being so satisfied.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.2&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Drawdown conditions.
</I>
	An Advance
	will be made by the Lender through the Facility Agent if each of the following conditions is fulfilled:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notice of Drawdown.
</I>
	The Facility Agent has received a Notice of Drawdown (which will be
	irrevocable) no later than 10.00am (Frankfurt time) 7 Business Days before the day on which the drawdown is proposed to be made,
	which identifies the Tranche and the Sub-Tranche to which it applies and which is accompanied by the documents and evidence as
	required by the Notice of Drawdown in form and substance satisfactory to the Facility Agent. However, no Notice of Drawdown will
	be required specifically relating to an Advance under an ECA Sub-Tranche.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	During relative Commitment Period.
</I>
	The date on which an Advance from a Tranche is made is
	a Business Day which falls during the Commitment Period for the same Tranche.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Principal amount.
</I>
	The principal amount of the
	proposed Advance:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(i)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as stated in the Notice of
	Drawdown for any Advance under an Import Sub-Tranche, is a minimum of USD 2,000,000 (or such other amount as the Facility Agent
	may agree); and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 19; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage245"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	18
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(ii)&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;together with the amount
	of the ECA Premium to be paid by way of an additional Advance pursuant to clause 4.1(b) (
<I>
	Advance to pay ECA Insurer
</I>
	) equal
	to or less than both the Available Commitment of the Tranche in question and the maximum undrawn amount of the relative Sub-Tranches
	on the date when the Advance is made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	In accordance with the Export Contracts.
</I>
	If the Advance is to be made from an Import Sub-Tranche
	of a Tranche, the amount requested in the Notice of Drawdown is in accordance with the relative Export Contract(s).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	No default.
</I>
	Both on the date of the Notice of Drawdown and on the date of drawdown of the
	proposed Advance no Event of Default, Potential Event of Default or Event of Mandatory Prepayment has occurred and is continuing
	or might result from the drawdown of the proposed Advance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Representations correct.
</I>
	Both on the date of the Notice of Drawdown and on the date of drawdown
	of the proposed Advance the representations and warranties set out in clause 11 which are to be repeated on such dates are true
	in all material respects.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.3&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Examination of documents by the
	Facility Agent.
</I>
	The Facility Agent&rsquo;s responsibility for the examination of any documents received with respect to the
	Export Contracts or the financing thereof under this Agreement will be limited to ascertaining that they appear on their face to
	be in accordance with their description within the meaning of such term under article 14 of the Uniform Customs and Practices for
	Documentary Credits, International Chamber of Commerce Publication 600, provided that the Facility Agent must check that each Notice
	of Drawdown has been signed by an Authorised Signatory of both the Borrower and a Contractor or, as the case may be, by an Authorised
	Signatory of the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.4&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Reduction in Import Costs.
</I>
	If the Tranche A Import Costs, the Tranche B Import Costs or the Tranche C Import Costs are reduced before the end of the Commitment
	Period for the same Tranche, the Commitment in respect of the Import Sub-Tranche in question will be reduced by such an amount
	as will ensure that the amount of such Import Sub-Tranche will not exceed the aggregate of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Import Costs reduction.
</I>
	85% of the reduced Import Costs in question.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Local Costs reduction.
</I>
	In respect of the amount available to reimburse the Local Costs in
	question, 30% of the reduced Import Costs in question.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage246"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

	19
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The reductions referred to above
	will be effected by the Facility Agent delivering to the Borrower a revised clause 2 (
<I>
	Amount and purpose
</I>
	) and Schedule 1
	(
<I>
	Commitment
</I>
	) that will replace the previous clause 2 and Schedule 1 as soon as practicable.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	3.5
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Cancellation of the Tranche A/Tranche B/Tranche C
	Commitments by the Borrower.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Permitted.
</I>
	The Borrower may, on giving to the Facility Agent not less than 15 Business Days&rsquo;
	prior notice, cancel the undrawn amount in whole or in part (any part being at least USD 5,000,000 and in multiples of USD 500,000)
	of the Commitment of any Tranche. Any such cancellation will be apportioned between the Sub-Tranches of the relative Tranche in
	such manner as the Facility Agent may determine in light of the requirements of the ECA Insurer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	ECA Insurer&rsquo;s fee.
</I>
	Even if the Commitment of any Tranche is cancelled in whole or
	in part, a processing fee or the whole of the ECA Insurer Premium may still be payable to the ECA Insurer. If this is the case,
	the Borrower agrees that, notwithstanding any such cancellation, it will pay (or reimburse the Facility Agent in respect of) any
	invoice from the ECA Insurer for a processing fee or in respect of its premium for the proposed transaction.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Switching between Tranches.
</I>
	With the consent of the Lender and the ECA Insurer any amount
	cancelled under clause 3.5 may be transferred to another Tranche.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.6&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Advances after Commitment Period.
</I>
	The Lender will be entitled to refuse to make any Advance for which a Notice of Drawdown is received by it after the end of the
	relative Commitment Period. The Facility Agent may, however, agree (with the Lender&rsquo;s and the ECA Insurer&rsquo;s consent)
	to extend a Commitment Period.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	ECA Insurer Premium
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	ECA Insurer Premium.
</I>
	The following will apply.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Due pro rata to Advances made.
</I>
	The ECA Insurer Premium (at a rate of 4.40%) is due on the
	amount of each Advance made to reimburse the aggregate amount of Import Costs, Local Costs and the ECA Insurer Premium, which is
	due in respect of such Advance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Advance to pay ECA Insurer
</I>
	. In accordance with clause 4.1(a), the Facility Agent is authorised
	and instructed by the Borrower, and the Lender also agrees, to
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 21; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage247"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	20
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	make &ndash; on each day on which
	an Advance is due to be made under the Tranche A Import Sub-Tranche, the Tranche B Import Sub-Tranche or the Tranche C Import Sub-Tranche
	&ndash; an additional Advance under the ECA Sub-Tranche of the Tranche in question and to pay the proceeds of such additional Advance
	to the ECA Insurer in satisfaction of the amount of the ECA Insurer Premium due.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.2&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower liable without Notice
	of Drawdown.
</I>
	Notwithstanding that the Borrower does not sign a Notice of Drawdown for an Advance pursuant to clause 4.1(b),
	the Borrower acknowledges and agrees as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Loan.
</I>
	Payments made by the Facility Agent pursuant to clause 4.1(b) constitute part of the
	Loan under the relative Tranche.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Borrower liable.
</I>
	The Borrower is the only person indebted as principal debtor in respect
	of such amounts irrespective of any rights that it may have under the Export Contracts or otherwise.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.3&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Details of ECA Insurer Premium.
</I>
	The exact amount of the ECA Insurer Premium will be calculated by the Facility Agent on the basis of the ECA Insurer Cover Documents.
	The Facility Agent will promptly send to the Borrower, the Lender and the ECA Insurer a statement setting out each such calculation
	at least 5 days before each amount of the ECA Insurer Premium is paid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.4&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Recalculation of premium amount.
</I>
	If, in the event of cancellation or voluntary prepayment of a loan amount at any time, the ECA Insurer decides to refund any ECA
	Insurer Premium and recalculates the amount thereof, the Facility Agent will provide the Borrower with a copy of such recalculation.
	The refunded amount shall be set-off against the repayment instalments as described below under 4.5.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.5&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Refund due to the Borrower.
</I>
	If the amount that has been financed by Advances under the relative ECA Sub-Tranche is more than the relative recalculated ECA
	Insurer Premium, the excess amount will be due to the Borrower after the Facility Agent has received such amount and the final
	invoice from the ECA Insurer. Payment of this excess amount will be made by the Lender applying the excess amount in or towards
	prepayment of repayment instalments outstanding under this Agreement. This prepayment will be done by the amount due being set
	off rateably against repayment instalments of the relative ECA Sub-Tranche then outstanding under this Agreement without any prior
	notice by the Lender to the Borrower regarding such set-off. The Facility Agent will inform the Borrower of any such set-off without
	delay.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	21
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.6&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Additional amount due from the
	Borrower.
</I>
	If the amount that has been financed by Advances under the relative ECA Sub-Tranche is less than the relative recalculated
	ECA Insurer Premium, the Borrower must upon receipt of the invoice pay the balance due to the ECA Insurer or, as the case may be,
	to the Facility Agent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Repayment and Prepayment
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Repayment of the Tranche A Loan.
</I>
	The following
	will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	On Tranche A Repayment Dates.
</I>
	The Borrower must repay the amount of the Tranche A Loan in
	17 semi-annual and consecutive instalments, one such instalment being due on each Tranche A Repayment Date, provided that if the
	Tranche A Commitment is reduced under clause 2.3 (
<I>
	Reduction in Commitment &ndash; No drawdown or reduced drawdown by first repayment
	date
</I>
	), the previous reference to &ldquo;17&rdquo; will be replaced by &ldquo;16&rdquo;. Each subsequent repayment instalment
	under Tranche A will be equal to 1/16 of the aggregate principal amount of Tranche A outstanding on the second Tranche A Repayment
	Date prior to the repayment being made.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If more than one repayment instalment
	under Tranche A falls due before the end of the Tranche A Commitment Period, such applicable differences shall be deemed to be
	repaid and cancelled in a similar manner as described in clause 2.3. The previous paragraph will then apply with the appropriate
	modifications.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Repayment instalments will be allocated
	to repay all Tranche A Sub-Tranches pro rata.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Amendments to the Repayment Schedule
</I>
	. In the event that there will be changes to the Repayment
	Schedule in accordance with this agreement, the Facility Agent will send the Lender, The ECA Insurer and the Borrower a new Repayment
	Schedule accordingly.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Repayment of the Tranche B Loan.
</I>
	The following
	will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	On Tranche B Repayment Dates.
</I>
	The Borrower must repay the amount of the Tranche B Loan in
	17 semi-annual, equal and consecutive instalments, one such instalment being due on each Tranche B Repayment Date, provided that
	if the Tranche B Commitment is reduced under clause 2.3 (
<I>
	Reduction in Commitment &ndash; No drawdown or reduced drawdown by
	first repayment date
</I>
	), the previous reference to &ldquo;17&rdquo; will be replaced by &ldquo;16&rdquo;. Each subsequent repayment
	instalment under Tranche B will be equal to 1/16 of the aggregate principal
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">

</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage249"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	amount of Tranche B outstanding
	on the second Tranche B Repayment Date prior to the repayment being made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If more than one repayment instalment
	under Tranche B falls due before the end of the Tranche B Commitment Period, such applicable differences shall be deemed to be
	repaid and cancelled in a similar manner as described in clause 2.3. The previous paragraph will then apply with the appropriate
	modifications.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Repayment instalments will be allocated
	to repay all Tranche B Sub-Tranches pro rata.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Amendments to the Repayment Schedule.
</I>
	In the event that there will be changes to the Repayment
	Schedule in accordance with this agreement, the Facility Agent will send the Lender, The ECA Insurer and the Borrower a new Repayment
	Schedule accordingly.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.3
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Repayment of the Tranche C Loan.
</I>
	The following
	will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	On Tranche C Repayment Dates.
</I>
	The Borrower must repay the amount of the Tranche C Loan in
	17 semi-annual, equal and consecutive instalments, one such instalment being due on each Tranche C Repayment Date, provided that
	if the Tranche C Commitment is reduced under clause 2.3 (
<I>
	Reduction in Commitment &ndash; No drawdown or reduced drawdown by
	first repayment date
</I>
	), the previous reference to &ldquo;17&rdquo; will be replaced by &ldquo;16&rdquo;. Each subsequent repayment
	instalment under Tranche C will be equal to 1/16 of the aggregate principal amount of Tranche C outstanding on the second Tranche
	C Repayment Date prior to the repayment being made..
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If more than one repayment instalment
	under Tranche C falls due before the end of the Tranche C Commitment Period, such applicable differences shall be deemed to be
	repaid and cancelled in a similar manner as described in clause 2.3. The previous paragraph will then apply with the appropriate
	modifications.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Repayment instalments will be allocated
	to repay all Tranche C Sub-Tranches pro rata.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	Schedule accordingly.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	5.4&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Voluntary prepayment
</I>
	. The
	Borrower may prepay the Loan, or any part of it which is USD 5,000,000 or a whole multiple of that amount, without premium or penalty
	on any Interest Payment Date on giving to the Facility Agent not less than 10 Business Days&rsquo; prior notice.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.5
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Miscellaneous provisions.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Notices of cancellation/prepayment.
</I>
	Any notice of cancellation or of prepayment under this
	Agreement is irrevocable and must specify the relevant date and the amount involved.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Cancellation/prepayment.
</I>
	No cancellation or prepayment is allowed except as provided in
	this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Appropriation of prepayments.
</I>
	Save where a clause provides for prepayment of a specified
	Tranche or Sub-Tranche, any partial prepayment of the Loan will be apportioned between the Tranches (and between the Sub-Tranches
	within each Tranche) pro rata and will in any event be applied against the remaining repayment instalments of the Loan in inverse
	chronological order.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	No reborrowing.
</I>
	The Borrower may not reborrow
	any amount that is prepaid.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.6
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Change-of-Control Event.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Definitions.
</I>
	For the purposes of clause 5.6:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a
<B>
	Change-of-Control Event
</B>
	occurs if the Parent or Telecom Italia S.p.a. ceases to control
	directly or indirectly more than 50% (fifty per cent) of the issued share capital of the Borrower; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	control
</B>
	means (1) the ownership of more than fifty percent (50%) of the share capital or
	the voting rights of an entity; or (2) the power to appoint or remove the majority of members of the governing bodies of an entity.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Borrower to notify Facility Agent; Consultation.
</I>
	If a Change-of-Control Event occurs:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Borrower must promptly inform the Facility Agent in writing;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Lender will not be obliged to make any Advance; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Facility Agent, the Lender and the Borrower will enter into consultations (for a period of
	not more than 30 (thirty) days) with a view to determining a
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 25; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage251"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	basis on which the Lender may
	(in its absolute discretion) be prepared to continue maintaining its Commitment and Loan under the Facility.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Effect of event.
</I>
	At any time after the earlier of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the lapse of 30 (thirty) days from the date on which the Facility Agent has received notice from
	the Borrower under clause 5.6(b)(i); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the lapse of 35 (thirty five) days from the occurrence of the Change-of-Control Event,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	the Facility
	Agent may by notice or notices to the Borrower:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	cancel the Total Commitments; and/or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	declare that all or any part of the amounts outstanding under the Finance Documents are immediately
	due and payable.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Effect of notice.
</I>
	Any such notice will take effect in accordance with its terms.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	5.7
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	ECA Event of Mandatory Prepayment.
</I>
	The following
	will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Obligations of the ECA Insurer.
</I>
	It will be an ECA Event of Mandatory Prepayment if any obligation
	expressed to be assumed by the ECA Insurer under the ECA Insurer Cover Documents is not or ceases to be (in whole or in part) a
	valid, binding and enforceable obligation of, or is rescinded or repudiated by, the ECA Insurer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Facility Agent to notify Borrower.
</I>
	If an ECA Event of Mandatory Prepayment occurs, the Facility
	Agent must notify the Borrower and the Lender promptly after becoming aware that it has occurred.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Effect of event.
</I>
	The Facility may at any time after the occurrence of an Event of Mandatory
	Prepayment by notice to the Borrower:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	cancel the Total Commitments; and/or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	declare that all or any part of the amounts outstanding under the Finance Documents relating to
	the same Tranche as the affected ECA Insurer Cover Documents are immediately due and payable. Such amounts shall be paid by the
	Borrower as soon as possible but in any event within 10 Business Days.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
