<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage252"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	25
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any such notice will take effect
	in accordance with its terms.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	6.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Interest
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6
<I>
	.
</I>
	1
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest Periods.
</I>
	Interest
	will be calculated on the Loan by reference to successive Interest Periods. The first Interest Period for each Advance will start
	on the date of drawdown of that Advance and each subsequent Interest Period will begin on the Interest Payment Date of the previous
	Interest Period. Each Interest Period for an Advance will be 6 months (the exact length of each Interest Period to be determined
	by the Facility Agent in accordance with market practice), except in each of the following circumstances:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Consolidation of Interest Periods.
</I>
	The first Interest Period for an Advance disbursed after
	the first Advance must end on the same day as the Interest Period then applicable to the first Advance but, if this would result
	in an Interest Period of less than 5 Business Days, such first Interest Period must end on the same day as the next following Interest
	Period applicable to the first Advance. From that day all such Advances will be consolidated into, and treated as, a single Advance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Not beyond Repayment Date.
</I>
	An Interest Period must end on a Repayment Date and, to the extent
	necessary, an Interest Period may be of less than 6 months ending on such date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.2
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Calculation of interest.
</I>
	The
	rate of interest on each Advance for each Interest Period is the percentage rate per annum equal to the aggregate of the Margin
	and the LIBOR Reference Rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.3
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Payment and calculation bases.
</I>
	The Borrower must pay to the Lender accrued interest on each Advance on each Interest Payment Date. Interest will be calculated
	on the basis of the actual number of days elapsed and a 360 day year for each Advance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.4
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Default interest.
</I>
	Subject
	to clause 6.5, if the Borrower fails to pay any amount payable by it under the Finance Documents on its due date, the Borrower
	must pay to the Lender interest on any such overdue amount for each day from its due date up to the date of actual payment (both
	before and after judgment) at a percentage rate per annum that is two per cent. per annum above the rate which would have been
	payable if the overdue amount had, during the period of non-payment, constituted an Advance in the currency of the overdue amount.
	For this purpose the Facility Agent may (acting reasonably) do each of the following in respect of any unpaid amounts under the
	Finance Documents:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 27; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage253"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	26
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Interest Periods.
</I>
	Select successive Interest Periods of any duration of up to three months.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Rate Fixing Day.
</I>
	Determine the appropriate Rate Fixing Day for each such Interest Period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any interest accruing under clause
	6.4 will be immediately payable by the Borrower to the Lender on demand by the Facility Agent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.5&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Overdue
	principal during Interest Period.
</I>
	Notwithstanding clause 6.4, if any overdue amount is all or part of an Advance that became
	due and payable prior to the last day of its current Interest Period, then each of the following will apply:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	First Interest Period.
</I>
	The first Interest Period for such overdue amount will be the unexpired
	portion of such current Interest Period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Applicable interest rate.
</I>
	The rate of interest on such overdue amount for that first Interest
	Period will be two per cent. per annum above the rate then payable on the Advance in question.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Subsequent Interest Periods.
</I>
	After the expiry of the first Interest Period for such overdue
	amount, the rate on the overdue amount will be calculated in accordance with clause 6.4.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.6
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Compounding of default interest.
</I>
	Default interest (if unpaid) arising on an overdue amount will be compounded with the overdue amount at the end of each Interest
	Period applicable to that overdue amount, but will remain immediately due and payable.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	6.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Notification of rates of interest
	and Break Costs.
</I>
	The Facility Agent will promptly notify the Borrower of the determination of an interest rate and of any Break
	Costs under this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	7.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Alternative Interest Rate; Break Costs
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	7.1
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Market disruption.
</I>
	If a Market
	Disruption Event occurs in relation to the Loan for any Interest Period, then the rate of interest on the Loan for that Interest
	Period will be the percentage rate per annum which is the sum of each of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Margin.
</I>
	The Margin.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Lender&rsquo;s funding costs.
</I>
	The rate notified by the Facility Agent to the Borrower at
	least one Frankfurt/London Banking Day before the first day of that Interest
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 28; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage254"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	27
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Period, to be that which expresses
	as a percentage rate per annum the cost to the Lender of obtaining funding for the Loan from the Participants.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	7.2
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Disruption event
</I>
	. Any of the following is a
<B>
	Market
	Disruption Event
</B>
	referred to in clause&nbsp;7:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(a)
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No LIBOR.
</I>
	At or
	about noon (Frankfurt time) on the Rate Fixing Day for any Interest Period the LIBOR Reference Rate is not accessible and cannot
	be determined.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(b)
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lender&rsquo;s funding
	cost not at LIBOR.
</I>
	In relation to any Interest Period the Facility Agent notifies the Borrower at the latest during the second
	Frankfurt/London Banking Day before the relevant Interest Period that the cost to the Lender of obtaining funding for the Loan
	from the Participants would be in excess of the LIBOR Reference Rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	7.3&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Negotiation clause
</I>
	. If a Market
	Disruption Event occurs the Facility Agent will, at the Borrower&rsquo;s request, enter into negotiations (for a period of not
	more than 30 days) with a view to agreeing a substitute basis for determining the interest rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	7.4
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Break Costs.
</I>
	The Borrower must pay the Facility
	Agent the Break Costs attributable to each of the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(a)
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Repayment not on an
	Interest Payment Date.
</I>
	All or any part of the Loan or an overdue amount being paid on a day other than the last day of an Interest
	Period for that Loan or overdue amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(b)
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Amount funded not drawn
	down.
</I>
	The Lender or any Participant funding, or making arrangements to fund, an Advance requested in a Notice of Drawdown where
	such Advance is not made by reason of the operation of any one or more of the provisions of this Agreement (other than by reason
	of default or negligence by the Lender or that Participant alone).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	8.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Taxes
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.1
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No deductions.
</I>
	All payments
	by the Borrower under the Finance Documents must be made without any deduction or withholding for, or on account of, any taxes,
	levies or other charges or withholdings of a similar nature (including any related penalty or interest) (a
<B>
	Tax Deduction
</B>
	).
	If a Tax Deduction is required by law to be made by the Borrower, the amount of the payment due from the Borrower must be increased
	to an amount which (after making
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 29; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage255"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	28
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any Tax Deduction) leaves an amount
	equal to the payment which would have been due if no Tax Deduction had been required.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.2&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Notification of withholding
</I>
	.
	If the Borrower becomes aware that the Borrower must make a Tax Deduction (or that there is a change in the rate or the basis of
	a Tax Deduction), it must promptly notify the Facility Agent. Similarly, the Lender must notify the Facility Agent on becoming
	so aware in respect of a payment payable to it. If the Facility Agent receives such notification from the Lender, it must notify
	the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	If deduction is required
</I>
	. If the Borrower is required
	to make a Tax Deduction, the following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Minimum deduction.
</I>
	The Borrower must make the minimum Tax Deduction required.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Payment.
</I>
	The Borrower must make any payment required in connection with that Tax Deduction
	within the time allowed by law.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Evidence of payment.
</I>
	Within 30 days of making either a Tax Deduction or a payment required
	in connection with a Tax Deduction, the Borrower must deliver to the Facility Agent or the Lender evidence reasonably satisfactory
	to it that the Tax Deduction has been made or (as applicable) that the appropriate payment has been paid to the relevant taxing
	authority.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	8.4
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Tax indemnity.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Scope.
</I>
	Except as provided in clause 8.4(b) and clause 8.5 (
<I>
	No recovery for tax gross-up
</I>
	)
	the Borrower must indemnify a Protected Party against any loss or liability which it determines will be or has been suffered (directly
	or indirectly) by it for, or on account of, tax in relation to a payment received or receivable (or any payment deemed to be received
	or receivable) under this Agreement or any Funding Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Excluded payments.
</I>
	Clause 8.4(a) does not apply to any tax assessed on a Protected Party
	under the laws of any jurisdiction in which:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Protected Party is incorporated or, if different, the jurisdiction (or jurisdictions) in which
	it is treated as resident for tax purposes; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Lender&rsquo;s Facility Office is located in respect of amounts received or receivable in that
	jurisdiction,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 30; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage256"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	29
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if that tax is imposed on or calculated
	by reference to the net income received or receivable by the Protected Party or the Lender, as the case may be. However, any payment
	deemed to be received or receivable will not be treated as net income received or receivable for this purpose.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.5
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No recovery for tax gross-up.
</I>
	Clause 8.4(a) does not apply to the extent that a loss or liability is compensated for by an increased payment under clause 8.1
	(
<I>
	No deductions
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.6&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notification of claim.
</I>
	If
	a Protected Party intends to make a claim under clause 8.4 (
<I>
	Tax indemnity
</I>
	), it must notify the Facility Agent of the event
	which will give, or has given, rise to the claim and the Facility Agent will then notify the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.7&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Tax Credit.
</I>
	If the Borrower
	makes a payment under clause 8.1 (
<I>
	No deductions
</I>
	) or clause 8.4 (
<I>
	Tax indemnity
</I>
	) (a
<B>
	Tax Payment
</B>
	) and the Facility
	Agent (in its sole discretion) determines that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Relief from tax.
</I>
	A credit, relief, remission or repayment in respect of tax is attributable
	to an increased payment of which that Tax Payment forms part, to that Tax Payment or to a Tax Deduction in consequence of which
	that Tax Payment was required; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Relief used.
</I>
	&#9;It has obtained and utilised
	such credit, relief, remission or repayment,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	it must pay an amount to the Borrower
	which the Facility Agent (acting reasonably) determines will leave it (after that payment) in the same after-tax position as it
	would have been in, if the Borrower had not made the Tax Payment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	8.8&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Stamp taxes.
</I>
	The Borrower
	must indemnify the Lender against any stamp duty, registration or other similar tax (together with any related penalty or interest)
	payable in respect of a Finance Document.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	8.9
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Indirect Tax.
</I>
	The following will apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Amounts are Indirect Tax exclusive.
</I>
	All amounts expressed to be payable under a Finance
	Document by the Borrower to the Lender which (in whole or in part) constitute the consideration for any supply for the purposes
	of any Indirect Tax are deemed to be exclusive of any Indirect Tax which is chargeable on such supply. Accordingly if any Indirect
	Tax is chargeable on any supply made by the Lender to the Borrower under a Finance Document and the Lender is required to account
	to the relevant tax authority for the Indirect Tax, the Borrower must pay
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 31; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage257"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	30
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to the Lender (in addition to
	and at the same time as paying the consideration) an amount equal to the amount of the Indirect Tax (and the Lender must promptly
	provide an appropriate Indirect Tax invoice to the Borrower &ndash; if applicable).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Indirect Tax on costs and expenses.
</I>
	Where a Finance Document requires the Borrower to reimburse
	or indemnify the Lender or the Facility Agent for any costs or expenses, the Borrower must at the same time pay or indemnify such
	Party against all Indirect Tax incurred by the Lender and the Facility Agent (or either of them) in respect of the costs or expenses
	to the extent that the Lender or the Facility Agent reasonably determines that it is not entitled to credit or repayment in respect
	of the Indirect Tax from the relevant tax authority.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	9.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Illegality
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	9.1
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Illegality &ndash; Notice to the
	Borrower.
</I>
	If it is unlawful for the Lender to make or obtain funding for any part of an Advance or for any Finance Party to
	perform its obligations under this Agreement or any Funding Agreement, the affected party must notify the Facility Agent promptly
	upon becoming aware that it is so unlawful and each of the following will apply:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Effect.
</I>
	The Facility Agent must promptly notify the Borrower that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Borrower must prepay the Loan together with accrued interest thereon and all other amounts
	payable by the Borrower to the Lender under the Finance Documents on the date determined under clause 9.1(b); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Commitment of the Lender is immediately cancelled.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	Any such
	notice will take effect in accordance with its terms.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	When due.
</I>
	The date for the payment will be the earlier of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the last day of the current Interest Period; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the date specified by the Facility Agent in its notification to the Borrower, which date must be
	the latest day allowed by law.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	10.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Mitigation
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	10.1&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Extra cost or illegality.
</I>
	The
	Finance Parties must, in consultation with the Borrower, take all reasonable steps to mitigate any circumstances which result or
	would result in any amount becoming payable under, or cancelled pursuant to, clause 8 (
<I>
	Taxes
</I>
	) or clause 9
<BR CLEAR="ALL">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 32; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage258"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	31
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(
<I>
	Illegality
</I>
	), including transferring
	its rights and obligations under the Finance Documents to an Affiliate or changing its Facility Office.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	10.2
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower&rsquo;s indemnity.
</I>
	The Borrower must indemnify a Finance Party for all costs and expenses reasonably incurred and duly documented by it as a result
	of any step taken by it under clause 10.1.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	10.3
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower&rsquo;s obligations
	remain.
</I>
	Clause 10.1 does not in any way limit the Borrower&rsquo;s obligations under the Finance Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	10.4
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No adverse effect.
</I>
	No Finance
	Party is obliged to take any step under clause 10.1 if, in its opinion (acting reasonably), to do so might be prejudicial to it.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	10.5
<I>
	&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conduct of business by the Finance
	Parties.
</I>
	No term of this Agreement will do any of the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Free to arrange its affairs.
</I>
	Interfere with the right of a Finance Party to arrange any
	of its affairs in whatever manner it thinks fit.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	No need to make a claim.
</I>
	Oblige a Finance Party to investigate or claim any credit, relief,
	remission or repayment available to it or the extent, order and manner of any claim.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	No disclosure.
</I>
	Oblige a Finance Party to disclose any information relating to any of its
	affairs or any tax computation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	11.
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Representations and Warranties
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	11.1
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Legal representations.
</I>
	The Borrower makes the
	following representations and warranties to each Finance Party:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Status.
</I>
	The Borrower is duly incorporated and validly existing as a company &ldquo;sociedade
	an&ocirc;nima&rdquo; with limited liability under the laws of the Relative Country and it has power to carry on its business as
	it is now being conducted and to own its property and other assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Corporate power.
</I>
	The Borrower has power to enter into and perform, and has taken all necessary
	action to authorise the entry into and performance of, the Transaction Documents to which it is a party and the transactions contemplated
	by those Transaction Documents, and no limitation on the Borrower&rsquo;s powers to borrow will be exceeded as a result of borrowing
	the Total Commitments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: RGB(84,48,26) 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage259"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; FONT: 9PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<I>
	Binding obligations.
</I>
	&#9;Subject to any general
	principles of law limiting its obligations and referred to in a legal opinion supplied under clause 3.1 (
<I>
	Conditions precedent
</I>
	),
	the Transaction Documents constitute its legal, valid, binding and enforceable obligations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Pari passu ranking.
</I>
	The Borrower&rsquo;s payment obligations under the Finance Documents
	rank not less than
<I>
	pari passu
</I>
	in right of payment with all other present and future unsecured and unsubordinated obligations
	under any of its debt instruments except for obligations mandatorily preferred by law applying to companies generally.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Governing law and enforcement.
</I>
	In any proceedings taken in the Relative Country in relation
	to a Finance Document:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;

</TD>

</TD>

	if it is a party to such Finance Document, the submission by the Borrower to the jurisdiction of
	the courts of the governing law of that Finance Document; and
</TD>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	will be recognised and enforced.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

	Project.

	and effect and admissible in evidence.

	procurement process or in the
	execution of any contract in connection with the Project; or
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>

	the implementation of the Project to the detriment of the Borrower, including collusion between tenderers.

<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	event within 120 days after the
	end of each of the relevant accounting periods, its interim consolidated semi-annual balance sheet and profit and loss account
	for the first 6 months of each of its financial years.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Semi-annual information from the Parent.
</I>
	Upon written request the Borrower will deliver
	to the Facility Agent as soon as they become available but in any event within 120 days after the end of each of the relevant accounting
	periods, its interim consolidated semi-annual report, balance sheet and profit and loss account for the first 6 months of each
	of its financial years.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Auditing of financial statements and change of auditors.
</I>
	The Company will have its annual
	financial statements (annual report, balance sheet and profit and loss account) audited by an independent internationally reputable
	auditor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

</I>
	The Borrower will within a reasonable time provide the Lender from time
	to time such further information on its general financial situation as the Lender may reasonably require.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	&ldquo;Know your customer&rdquo; checks &ndash; Information from the Borrower.
</I>
	The Borrower
	will promptly on the request of the Facility Agent (whether for itself or on behalf of any Finance Party) supply to it any documentation
	or other evidence that is reasonably required by a Finance Party (whether for itself or on behalf of any person to whom such Finance
	Party may, or may intend to, transfer any of its rights or obligations under this Agreement) to enable such Finance Party or any
	such person to carry out and be satisfied with the results of all applicable identification checks that such Finance Party or any
	such person is obliged to carry out in order to meet its obligations under any applicable law or regulation to identify a person
	who is (or is to become) its customer.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	12.2&#9;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<I>
	Covenants relating to the Project.
</I>
	The undertakings in clause 12.2 will apply from the date of this Agreement for so long as any amount is outstanding under the
	Finance Documents or any Commitment is in force.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Not change the Project.
</I>
	The Borrower will not change the nature or scope of the Project.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Not change Export Contracts.
</I>
	The Borrower will not, without the Facility Agent&rsquo;s or
	without the ECA Insurer&rsquo;s prior written consent, terminate or materially change the terms and conditions of the Export Contracts
	that may cause impact to the Transaction Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Obtain Authorisations &ndash; Registration in SISBACEN.
</I>
	The Borrower will obtain, maintain
	and comply with all Authorisations necessary to enable it to perform its obligations under the Transaction Documents to which it
	is a party, or required for the validity, enforceability or admissibility in evidence in the Relative Country of the Transaction
	Documents. Without limiting the foregoing, upon each Advance made by the Lender under this Agreement, the Borrower will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	effect the registration of the repayment schedule (
<I>
	esquema de pagamentos
</I>
	) under the relevant
	ROF in the Central Bank&rsquo;s electronic system SISBACEN; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	provide a copy of such registration to the Facility Agent,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in each case within 15 days of the
	entry into the Relative Country of the funds disbursed under the relevant Advance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Environmental guidelines.
</I>
	The Borrower shall comply with the Environmental and Social Guidelines
	and obtain and comply with all material environmental licences required in connection with its assets and its business.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	12.3&#9;
<I>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;General covenants.
</I>
	The undertakings
	in clause 12.3 will apply from the date of this Agreement for so long as any amount is outstanding under the Finance Documents
	or any Commitment is in force.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Comply with laws.
</I>
	The Borrower will comply in all material respects with all laws and regulations
	to which it is subject.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	No disposals.
</I>
	Subject to clause 12.3(c), the Borrower will not either in a single transaction
	or in a series of transactions whether related or not and whether voluntarily or involuntarily dispose of any part of its assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Disposals exception.
</I>
	Clause 12.3(b) does not apply to any disposal of assets for fair market
	value and at arm&rsquo;s length:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the aggregate book value of which, during the time when clause 12.3(b) applies, does not exceed
	an amount equivalent to R$3,000,000,000 (three billion Reais);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	made in the ordinary course of trading of the disposing entity;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	made in exchange for other assets comparable or superior as to type, value and quality; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	made with the prior written consent of the Facility Agent.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For the purposes of clauses 12.3(b)
	and 12.3(c),
<I>
	dispose
</I>
	and
<I>
	disposal
</I>
	includes any act effecting sale, transfer, lease or other disposal.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Negative pledge.
</I>
	Subject to clause 12.3(e), the Borrower will not, and will ensure that
	none of its Subsidiaries will, permit any Security to subsist, arise or be created or extended over all or any part of its present
	or future assets or revenues.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Negative pledge exception.
</I>
	Clause 12.3(d) does not apply:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to Security listed in Schedule 4 (
<I>
	Existing security
</I>
	);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to any vendor&rsquo;s lien or other encumbrance on land or other assets, where such encumbrance
	secures only the purchase price or any credit, having a term of not more than twelve months, obtained to finance it;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to any Security, lien or other encumbrance arising by operation of law or judicial requirements
	and decisions;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to any pledge over inventories created to secure any short-term credit;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to any Security granted to BNDES over assets the aggregate value of which does not exceed R$6,500,000,000
	(six billion, five million Reais);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(vi)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to any Security over or affecting any asset acquired by the Borrower after the date of this Agreement
	and subject to which such asset is acquired, if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	such Security was not created in contemplation of the acquisition of such asset by the Borrower,
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the amount thereby secured has not been increased in contemplation of, or since the date of, the
	acquisition of such asset the Borrower; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(vii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if the Borrower&rsquo;s obligations under this Agreement are at the same time secured equally and
	rateably with such Security by an instrument satisfactory in all respects to the Facility Agent.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<I>
	Change in business.
</I>
	The Borrower will procure that no substantial change is made to the
	core business of the Borrower or the Group as a whole from that carried on at the date of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
